entry.title: 31" Tall Tapered Cylinder Glass Candle Holder - Clear Floor Candle Holder Centerpiece
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 78.99

[About]

1 Qty: 1 Glass Candle Holder
Material: Glass
Color: Clear
Style: Cylinder
Height: 31"
Body Width: 8"
Depth: 31"
Base Diameter: 4"
Opening Diameter: 4"
Glass Thickness: 0.20"
Premium Quality: Made from high quality, handcrafted, crystal clear glass
Unique Design: Suitable for all styles: Modern, Contemporary, Eclectic or Vintage
Perfect for floral and centerpiece displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Premium Quality Candle Holder

Crystal clear transparency of premium quality glass is highlighted by the artistic shapes and highly detailed finishing of our Glass Candle Holders. Boasting contemporary styles of modern art and high grade glass construction, these eclectic decorative centerpiece Candle Holders are perfect for making stunning centerpieces and unique floral, candle, or succulent display.

Multi-Purpose & Versatile

Multi-purpose and versatile, these gorgeous decorative floor Candle Holders look totally tantalizing on their own, but also make an excellent accent for modern homes and minimalist decor. Bring a modish twist to your kitchen cabinets by storing pasta and rice or dried pulses and spices. Layer with colorful sand, glitter or Candle Holder fillers to create one of a kind centerpiece. Besides making awe-inspiring accent pieces, these clear glass cylinder Candle Holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and house warming presents.

Create One Of A Kind Arrangements

This ribbed design glass jar is full of character and makes a fantastic Candle Holder, centerpiece or can be used as a novel way to display treasures with moss or a mini still life. Create one of a kind flower arrangement by combining fresh seasonal flowers and picks, or opt for our long lasting life-like artificial flowers and greenery. Display refreshing colors of nature by making pretty succulent and cacti accented arrangement,  fill with water and light submersible LEDs and candles for an exotic display of shine and sparkle.

 

Additional Information:

  • Can put water, sand, and vase fillers
  • A great container for Wedding Reception or Garden Style Wedding Decor.
  • Makes a perfect and memorable gift!
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

entry.title: 6 Pack | 18" Heavy Duty Square Cylinder Glass Candle Holder
entry.summary:

[Information]

Made from heavy duty and high quality see-through glass, our stylish range of decorative Candle Holders makes an ideal adornment and eye-catching decorative accents for any party or home decor. Our hand blown square Candle Holders with their thick walls and weighted base will give a modern twist to any floral or centerpiece decoration. These glass centerpiece Candle Holders will instantly add flair and visual appeal to any ordinary party or table setting. This size is perfect for tall candles; fill with jelly filler balls or acrylic ice crystals of your theme color and top with a submersible LED or a floating candle to create exotic decorative accent. For an even more luxurious look and feel, swathe our satin or organza ribbons around with a cute bow or a flower to make an ethereal party favor or a votive candle holder.

Additional Information: 

  • QTY: 6 Glass Candle Holders / Order
  • Material: High Quality Glass
  • Color: Clear

  • Thickness: 4 mm

  • Heavy Duty
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.

[Information] 

Height Adjustable Columns:

Romans ruled the world for a long time and left unsurpassable assets for the entire world to cherish and benefit from, most important of which being architectural splendidness. Roman pedestal columns and pillars have never left their gloriousness and firm supremacy in contemporary construction; major European and American structures are the epitome of Roman inspiration. 

 Decorative Columns:

Our Roman Doric pedestal columns are specially designed with high quality plastic to bring the glorious touch of Roman architecture into your special events, imparting a Grand imperial touch to your decorations.

Multipurpose & Versatile:

Let these pedestal columns stand tall by your passage way or stage side, reminding of the past, decorate with our ivy garlands, pearl flowers, glitter accented leaves, ribbons, bows, or LEDs. Glam your events venue up with these triumphant pedestal columns standing proud, bedazzling your guests with their exultancy! 
Additional Information:
